pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Elastic-Net Regularized Presence-Only Model // Presence-only model with Elastic Net penalty is a regularized generalized linear model training on the presence-absence response. This package provides functions for tuning and fitting the presence- only model. The presence-only model can be used to predict regulatory effects of genetic variants at sequence-level resolution by integrating a large number of epigenetic features and massively parallel reporter assays (MPRAs).
